article:
My friend, Lin Tao, went on vacation in New York with his parents. He _ back last week. He came to _ me yesterday and gave me a nice hat. He said he had a great _ in New York. He and his parents visited many _ places and went shopping there.
Lin Tao _ went to his pen pal's home for the first time. He didn't know the _ to his friend's house. A friendly American boy _ him to find it at last. Lin Tao's pen pal is Jimmy. He could _ a little Chinese, because he had a trip to China last year. Lin Tao and Jimmy talked _ English and Chinese. Lin Tao had dinner with Jimmy's family. They took many photos with a _ . I knew a lot about them from these photos.
